Name: Bibliometric analysis of terrestrial Holocene palaeoenvironmental proxies from across the Central American Isthmus
Description: A systematic map of proxy records extracted from terrestrial archives in Central America spanning the Holocene (c.1200B.P. to present day). Data extracted includes: reference, title, author(s), journal, year, language, country, name of sites, longitude, latitude, elevation, type of archive, proxies, dating methods and time span.

Fields.Name: Proxy Measure
Fields.Description: Proxy used for reconstructing environment

Fields.Name: Environmental Archive
Fields.Description: Depositional archive from which environmental proxies were found

Fields.Name: Ecoregion Name
Fields.Description: Ecoregion of the study site

Fields.Name: Biome Name
Fields.Description: Biome of the study site

Fields.Name: Publication Journal
Fields.Description: Journal in which the study was published

Fields.Name: Country
Fields.Description: Country in which the study was conducted

Fields.Name: Publication Year
Fields.Description: Year in which the study was first published

Fields.Name: Average Annual Precipitation
Fields.Description: Modern average annual preciptation of the study site

Fields.Name: Covariance of Annual Precipitation
Fields.Description: Modern covariance of annual preciptation of the study site

Fields.Name: Driest Month
Fields.Description: Modern average monthly preciptation of the driest month for the study site

Fields.Name: Driest Quarter
Fields.Description: Modern average quarterly preciptation of the driest quarter for the study site

Fields.Name: Wettest Month
Fields.Description: Modern average monthly preciptation of the wettest month for the study site

Fields.Name: Wettest Quarter
Fields.Description: Modern average quarterly preciptation of the wettest quarter for the study site

Fields.Name: Meters Above Sea Level
Fields.Description: Elevation of study site above sea level

Fields.Name: Newest Date (B.C.E/C.E)
Fields.Description: Most recent date in the time series

Fields.Name: Oldest Holocene Date (B.C.E/C.E)
Fields.Description: Oldest Holocene date in the time series (-12,000 B.C.E to 2020 C.E)

Fields.Name: Length of Time Series
Fields.Description: Total length, in years, of studied time series

Fields.Name: Unit of Proxy
Fields.Description: Units used to measure the proxy in the study

Fields.Name: Proxy Interpretation
Fields.Description: Authors' interpretation of the proxy data

Fields.Name: Number of Independent Dates
Fields.Description: Number of independent dates used to construct time series

Fields.Name: Sequence Dating
Fields.Description: Was the sequence dated at the top and/or the bottom?

Fields.Name: Continuous Record
Fields.Description: Was the record reported as continuous?

Fields.Name: Hard Water Error
Fields.Description: Did the author report a problem with 'hard water'?

Fields.Name: Presentation of Data
Fields.Description: Did the study present the data against depth or time?

Fields.Name: Evidence of Agriculture
Fields.Description: Did the author present direct or indirect evidence of agriculture?

Fields.Name: Raw Data Available
Fields.Description: Did the author make the raw data used in the study available with the publication?
